title: Client not opening/Authenticating forever when it does
body: So riot are you gonna tell us whats goin on this time or are you gonna neglect your community and just let us wait thinking its something wrong on our end everytime. Please fix, i realize there is a patch but at least have correct times of when ur client is going to be down.

replies.body: I don't currently see any issues with logging in.  In regards to downtime for patches or maintenance, we do try to give advanced notice through the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  There is one currently for the upcoming patch.  If you're not able to login, let me know what error you're getting as well as which client version you're on.  I'm happy to help!
So whats the fix then lol

Thanks!  What happens if you try accessing the legacy client?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"
